channel.title: How To Make Sites Think You Are Using Internet Explorer
channel.description:
Basicly, this tutorial shows you how to make website think you're using Internet Explorer on Firefox Im too lazy to make pics, sorry
Source: http://johnbokma.com/mexit/2004/04/24/changinguseragent.html
Step 1)Type about:config in the address bar.
Step 2)Right Click>New>String
Step 3)Type general.useragent.override
Step 4)Type Internet Explorer/7.0
Thats It :cool:

item.title: How To Make Sites Think You Are Using Internet Explorer
